resources.string: XYREM® (sodium oxybate) oral solution, 0.5 g/mL is a prescription medicine indicated for the following symptoms of narcolepsy: Excessive daytime sleepiness (EDS) I Cataplexy.\n\nXYREM may only be given to patients enrolled in the XYREM REMS Program.
Sitting inactive in a publice place, such as a theater or a meeting
As a passenger in a car for an hour without a break
Lying down to rest in the afternoon when circumstances permit
Sitting quitely after a lunch without alcohol
In a car, while stopped for a few minutes in traffic.
Compared to before you started taking XYREM, how frequent are your cataplexy attacks today?

1. Are there any activities I should avoid?

 2. A re there any diet or exercise programs or schedule that will help control my symptoms?

 3. How should I incorporate napping into my schedule?

 4. What type of sleep schedule will benefit me most?

 5. Over time, can l expect my symptoms to stay the same? Progress? Improve?

If you don\'t take dose 1 at your scheduled time you may need to reschedule dose 2 to be taken 2½ to 4 hours after taking dose 1 or as directed by your prescriber.\n\nTo receive plan notifications they must be set to \"allow\" in Android settings>notifications. Alarm sounds will not be heard if the volume is turned down or set to vibrate mode.

1.   Are there any activities I should avoid?


 2.   Are there any diet or exercise programs or schedule that will help control my symptoms?


 3.   How should I incorporate napping into my schedule?


 4.   What type of sleep schedule will benefit me most?


 5.   Over time, can l expect my symptoms to stay the same? Progress? Improve?

1.   Questions or concerns you have about your medications or your condition


 2.   Challenges with your Xyrem medication routine


 3.   Changes in your symptoms or how you feel


 4.   New medications (prescription, OTC, herbals, etc.) you're taking
You can add up to 3 naps to your daily plan if you\'d like, or click next.
Inspire+ can let you know about upcoming plan events.
Use the defaults or choose what works best for you.

Let's setup a plan that's perfect for your schedule.

Answer the following questions about your typical day and we'll put it together for you.

At the end, you can adjust specific days to meet your needs.
What time would you like to wake up?
How much time do you want to schedule between dose 2 and wake?
What is your prescribed time between dose 1 and dose 2?
Based on your selections, Inspire+ has prepared a weekly schedule for you.\n\nNext, you can adjust any day of the schedule as needed.

When planning your schedule,
remember you need to take your first
dose of XYREM at bedtime while you
are in bed.
Based on your answers, this is a typical day\'s schedule. Click next to confirm.
Select any day to adjust it\'s schedule

Reset plan will completely clear the 
current seven day schedule. After
reset, you can setup a new plan.

Reset plan does not clear any existing
 reports data.
Are you sure want to delete this note ?
Got progress to brag about? Share your report with your doctor right from your phone
Having healthy sleep habits can help you feel less sleep and more alert during the day. Take this short quiz to test your knowledge, and learn more about healthy sleep habits.
Take the dose while your are in bed and remain in bed afterwards. Take your seconde dose betwen 2½ to 4 hours after your first dose, or as prescribed by your doctor.

The Inspire+ app is intended for educational, planning and tracking purposes only, and cannot be used as a diagnostic device. The Inspire+ app is not intended to offer or replace professional medical advice. Your healthcare professional is the single best source of information; please consult them if you have any questions about your health or treatment. Proper dosing and administration must be discussed with and prescribed by your physician. You are encouraged to report negative side effects of prescription drugs to the FDA. Visit www.fda/gov/medwatch or call 1-800-FDA-1088.\n\nJazz Pharmaceuticals plc or its subsidiaries (“Jazz Pharmaceuticals”) make no express or implied representations or warranties of any kind or nature with respect to any of the information contained on this application or the operability of the application. Jazz Pharmaceuticals disclaims all representations and/or warranties, express or implied, created by law, contract or otherwise, including without limitation, any warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title or noninfringement. In no event shall Jazz Pharmaceuticals be liable for any damages of any kind or nature, including without limitation, direct, indirect, special, consequential or incidental damages arising from or in connection with the existence or use of the Inspire+ app and/or the information.

Jazz Pharmaceuticals respects the privacy of those who use its mobile applications and is committed to the protection of personal information. The Inspire+ app does not automatically collect personal information about users. All personal information and data entered into the application by the user remains exclusively on the user’s mobile device unless the user in their sole discretion takes actions to transfer the data to other systems or parties.

Non-Personal Information may be collected, such as the type of mobile device used, the mobile device unique device ID, the IP address of the mobile device, the mobile operating system, non-precise geolocation information and information about the way the user uses the Application. This Application does not collect precise information about the location of your mobile device. This information is used for our business purposes such as data analysis, improving our products and services and identifying usage trends, and to help diagnose problems with our servers and applications and for purposes of system administration. Jazz Pharmaceuticals will treat any information it collects through the Inspire+ app consistent with the terms of the Jazz Pharmaceuticals Privacy Policy, which can be found at www.jazzpharma.com. Jazz Pharmaceuticals may change or modify the Privacy Policy from time to time and therefore you should check the Privacy Policy when you use this Application. By using this application, the user is agreeing to the collection of information through the application as described in this Policy.

You may opt-out of all collection of information by uninstalling the Application from your mobile device. You may use the standard uninstall processes as may be available as part of your mobile device or via the mobile application marketplace or network.

Although Jazz Pharmaceuticals uses reasonable physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards to protect information as it is transmitted to Jazz Pharmaceuticals, the confidentiality of any personal information or the transmission of data via the Internet or email is not completely secure or error-free, and Jazz Pharmaceuticals cannot guarantee the security of any data or personal information transmitted through the application. The user should also recognize that use of the application is solely at their own risk. Jazz Pharmaceuticals encourages the user to lock their phone, iPad or other device to increase the security of personal information. The user is solely responsible for protecting the application data on their mobile device from loss through a backup process. Jazz Pharmaceuticals shall have no obligation to furnish any maintenance and support services with respect to the Inspire+ app.

The Inspire+ app uses IOS Notifications to help keep you on your scheduled plan and for program messages. To receive plan notifications they must be set to “allow” in IOS settings>notifications. Alarm sounds will not be heard if the volume is turned down or set to vibrate mode.
For questions about XYREM, call your doctor or the Certified Pharmacy at SDS at 1-866-997-3688
If you need technical support for the Inspire+ android app, please complete this form.
Experts say it may take between 60 and 90 days to form a new habit. You made it, Congrats!
WOW! That\'s a new record. 45 days of active use. You are on a roll!
Congrats! You have kept to your daily plan for a month!
You broke your record! Congrats on tracking for one month! View your report to see your progress.
WOW! That\'s a new record. You have learned, panned, and tracked for 14 days. Keep up the good work!
Hey there, super symptom tracker! Congrats on your new record of 7 days.
Way to go! You stayed on top of your schedule for an entire week. Keep up the great work.
Congrats! Yesterday you were right on schedule with all planned events. Keep up the great work.
Almost there! Confirm all planned events within 15 minutes to stay right on schedule. Keep at it.
You are on a roll! Way to track your symptoms yesterday. Keep up the great work.
Active use can help you stay on top of your plan. Can you get back on track tomorrow? We bet you can!
Don\'t forget to track your EDS and cataplexy symptoms. We\'ll create a shareable progress report for you!
Using your app to confirm your doses may help you stick with your dosing plan. Give it a try!
Can using your app to confirm doses and track symptoms help? Inspire+ app users think so! Give it a try!
Got progress to brag about? Share your report with your doctor right from your phone
